title: Alternative Healing
description: Worth trying out another way Most of our wellness partners offer a mix of western and eastern treatment therapies. Some of their programs include acupuncture, acupressure, magneto therapy, shiatsu, herbalism, meditation, aromatherapy, cupping, ayurveda, homeopathy, naturopathy, yoga, hydropathy or reiki.
cleaned_text: Wellness centers in Czech Republic use the healing properties of thermal mineral water that is sourced locally. Our partner in Piestany makes use of the famous natural springs as well. Guests are treated with local thermal mineral water and sulphur mud. Several wellness resorts in Turkey offer fasting and detox as a healing method along with biophoton therapy, magneto therapy, yoga and meditation. The wellness clinic in Spain offers traditional chinese medicine treatments such as: acupuncture, acupressure, cupping, moxibustion and phytotherapy. Switzerland's Medical Health Center uses the healing properties of thermal mineral water as well as Traditional Chinese Medicine. Our partners in Portugal specialize on thalassotherapy treatments. Other treatments that are applied are energetic healing, ozone therapy, mesotherapy, aromatherapy, osteopathy and microneedling, to name a few. Italy's very unique wellness center offers cellular resonance treatments, tendon-muscle massages and Hydro-energy treatments (include hydro-aromatherapy, phyto-mud therapy and hydro-jet massages). Moreover, osteopathy, revitalizing therapy (infusions), oxygen-ozone therapy, Kinesis and Yoga are part of different programs.
